channel.title: Pray problem
channel.description:
Problem: when ever i use melee pray it works except it doesnt give the correct headicon. here is the headicon when i do the melee pray.
Picture / Error report: [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/qohtus.jpg[/img]
as you can see, it gives the skull instead of the melee sign, i have looked but i have no idear how they code prayer and it doesnt make sence. please could you tell me how to change it. the pray icon is in spirits but not sure what to edit.
i know which file etc just dont know how to change the icon when clicking on the prayer.
i am using project fubergen's v8's client.
anyone help.
thanks,[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 04, 2009, 04:53:04 am[/size][hr]anyone?
